PPLoc: Edelman Employee Handbook (posted on the company intranet); see link below
activities: Edelman receives, processes and uses personal data from its EU based offices to carry out its obligations under employment and benefit laws, to administer employee participation in its benefit, compensation and human resources plans and programs (using the PeopleSoft Enterprise Resource Planning system), for performance management (also using PeopleSoft), quality monitoring, and for compliance reporting and investigation (using the online SAI Global helpline and case management system).  Edelman also contracts with third party providers to render related services, including payroll processors, call centers, insurance and benefits administration.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources Data, on-line, off-line, and manually processed data
